name: Sierra Income Corporation
description: Sierra Income Corporation is a business development company (BDC) focused on investing in private middle-market companies in the United States. Founded in 2014, the company seeks to provide a diversified portfolio of debt and equity investments in growth-oriented companies. Sierra Income Corporation aims to generate attractive risk-adjusted returns for its shareholders through a combination of income and capital appreciation. The company primarily invests in senior secured loans, subordinated debt, and equity securities, utilizing a disciplined investment approach to identify opportunities with strong management teams and growth potential. Sierra Income Corporation has a strong emphasis on sustainable investing and is committed to supporting companies that prioritize environmental, social, and governance (ESG) practices. With its experienced management team and strategic investment strategy, Sierra Income Corporation is well-positioned to navigate the complexities of the private equity landscape and deliver value to its investors. The company is publicly traded and adheres to the regulatory requirements set forth by the SEC, ensuring transparency and accountability to its shareholders.

seo.meta_description: Explore Sierra Income Corporation, a leading business development company investing in private middle-market companies. Learn about our investment approach and commitment to sustainable practices.

faq.answer: Sierra Income Corporation is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.
